subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The lack of a breakout quarterback has cast a shadow on this N.F.L. draft, yet it is a strong class for offensive and defensive linemen and a deep class at defensive back.
snippet: The lack of a breakout quarterback has cast a shadow on this N.F.L. draft, yet it is a strong class for offensive and defensive linemen and a deep class at defensive back.
